title: Hey guys I find some error which is being changed to Grasp of the Undying though set Aftershock.
body:
Hi guys, Good morning!

Here is the issue.
I logged in league to play practice mode with new rune and builds with Khazix but I am really sure that I set Aftershock rune to play. But at the moment when I got in to loading, it changed to Grasp of the Undying automatically so I thought it was an error that has came out after recent patch. So I tried like 10 times to settle that issue in custom game and practice game and normal, but I can not find what's problem now. I want to ask you guys that is this issue only happening to me or to you guys. Also I hope that Riot may help me with this.
Thanks for reading.
{{champion:121}}

replies.body: You can't take Aftershock on Kha'Zix because he can't proc it, in the same way it switches slightly magical boots on Cass to perfect timing because she can't wear boots.
Thanks man, now I see the reason.
